name: whispermac
description: AI-powered dictation for Mac using multiple transcription engines
author: Explosion Scratch

scripts.fullclean: rm -rf dist .crush *.log vendor release build && bun install
scripts.build: tsc && cd src/renderer-app && bun run build && cd ../.. && node scripts/copy-assets.js && node scripts/prep-vad-assets.js
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --watch scripts --watch package.json --watch tsconfig.json --ext ts,js,json,html,css --exec "bun run single-dev"
scripts.single-dev: concurrently --raw -m 1 "rm -rf dist"  "bun run killothers" "bun run build" "bun run start" --names "cleanup, kill port, build, dev"
scripts.prep: bun run setup:plugins && node scripts/prep-vad-assets.js && bun scripts/download-photon.js && node scripts/build-get-selection.js && bun run build:native && bun run build:parakeet && bun run build:cli && bun run icons
scripts.build:native: cd native/mac-input && bunx node-gyp rebuild && cd ../audio-capture && bunx node-gyp rebuild
scripts.bundleid: mdls -name kMDItemCFBundleIdentifier -r release/mac-arm64/WhisperMac.app || mdls -name kMDItemCFBundleIdentifier -r release/mac-x64/WhisperMac.app
scripts.build:mac: bun run build && bun run strip:release && electron-builder --publish=never
scripts.build:mac:arm64: bun run build && bun run strip:release && electron-builder --arm64 --publish=never
scripts.build:mac:x64: bun run build && bun run strip:release && electron-builder --x64 --publish=never
scripts.build:dev: rm -rf /Applications/WhisperMac.app && bun run build:mac && bun run removequarantine && bun run resetperms && rs release/mac-arm64/WhisperMac.app /Applications && osascript -e 'tell application "WhisperMac" to activate' && tail -f ~/Library/Logs/whispermac/main.log
scripts.start:prod: rm -rf release && rm -rf /Applications/WhisperMac.app && bun run killothers && bun run build:mac && rs release/mac-arm64/WhisperMac.app /Applications && osascript -e 'tell application "WhisperMac" to activate' && tail -f ~/Library/Logs/whispermac/main.log

extendInfo.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: WhisperMac needs microphone access to capture your voice for accurate speech-to-text transcription and dictation.
extendInfo.NSAccessibilityUsageDescription: WhisperMac needs accessibility permissions to automatically insert transcribed text where you're typing, providing seamless dictation workflow.
